oai_dc:dc.dc:title: William Churchill Kirkland shadowbox
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Shadowbox containing a carte-de-visite of William Churchill Kirkland (January 10, 1839 - January 6, 1926). It also contains a 1914 reunion ribbon for a joint Confederate and Federal reunion. Kirkland enlisted at Corinth, Mississippi, on June 2, 1861. He served in Company G, 6th Alabama Infantry Regiment, CSA.
